amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for the Office of Inspector General Salaries and Expenses by 2 million and increase funding for the Smithsonian Institution Salaries and Expenses by $1,500,000 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Office of Inspector General Salaries and Expenses by 2 million and increase funding for the Smithsonian Institution Salaries and Expenses by $1,500,000 million.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Jackson Lee amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
